description.lang: Animus Heart is a multi-protocol smart home controller. It brings devices from Z-Wave, Wi-Fi, BT and different protocols on 433 MHz to one common interface. Everything is powered by a 1.2 GHz quad core processor. Data is collected and stored on the Animus Heart to protect user privacy. With the Animus Heart, the smart home also works properly without internet connection. This gives stability and reliability.From the app or web browser the smart home can be controlled or automated. No matter place, the smart home is at remote access. Animus Heart supports latest Z-Wave Plus with S2 Security.
